resources.string: TourGuide
Welcome to the
London Tour Guide
This app will allow you to quickly find things to do in London during the day
Page 1 - Random fun things
Page 2 - Museums
Page 3 - Restaurants
Page 4 - Sight Seeing
Swipe Right to Continue!
Fun arcade situated in the heart of London. Games such as Mario Kart and Street Fighter
Iconic clock tower The Big Ben is a must see attraction
Have an open bus tour of your new favourite city visiting sites such as The London Eye and The Big Ben
Visit Circ du Soleil for a unique exiting and fast paced evening.
Come to the design museum and see marverlous creations by new and up coming artists.
Have a picnic by the Princess Diana Memorial Fountain.
Fantastic American diner, your one stop shop for burgers wings and ribs!
Tower over london whilst dining on exsquisint food, make sure to try the duck and waffle combo.
Get a little bit of London in your life, try out the national meal of fish and chips.
Bonjour, come down to the chateaux where breadsticks and bagguettes are our speciality.
See the shopping centre by the sea at Gunwharf Quays, have lunch looking at the ocean.
See London from above and beyond as you can ride the London Eye for half an hour.
Get a blast from the past in the London museum, looking at how far London has come
Need a little bit of spice in your life? Come and get yourself a burrito at our all you can eat buffet!
Do you like art? Well come down to see our national art gallery.
The national history museum will give you a slice of history from all over the world
Paddle your way across the vast ocean within hyde park for a relaxing day out
Consider yourself a sharpshooter? Get a group together and come and try your hand at being a real soldier.
Become a detective for an hour, break out of our panic room!
Want a relaxed day with family and friends, come down to byron park and chill out!
World War 1 and World War 2 memorabelia as well as a sneak peak into the future of our Air Force
Food from the hood, get yourself some sams
Embrace your inner nerd! Come down to the science museum to see why the world really is the way it is.
Enjoy fine dining and a great atmosphere? Come to the shard, check the prices before you get a heart attack.
American soul food straight off the grill! Get yourself down to the spot!
The modern art museum that will have your head cocked to the left.
More of a castle than a tower! come and visit one of Londons greatest attractions
Bounce your way over to our trampoline park situated in the heart of london! We have slamball and dodgeball!
